docs.snippet: Colombia coach Jose Pekerman avoided questions about Luis Suarez, ducked any assessment of the striker's punishment and didn't mention his name ahead of Saturday's World Cup second-round match against Uruguay....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colombia coach Jose Pekerman avoided questions about Luis Suarez, ducked any assessment of the striker's punishment and didn't mention his name ahead of Saturday's World Cup second-round match against Uruguay.

headline.main: No Mention of Suarez by Colombia's Pekerman
headline.print_headline: No Mention of Suarez by Colombia's Pekerman

docs.snippet: Giorgio Chiellini believes Luis Suarez has been harshly punished by FIFA for biting his shoulder during their decisive World Cup match....
docs.lead_paragraph: Giorgio Chiellini believes Luis Suarez has been harshly punished by FIFA for biting his shoulder during their decisive World Cup match.

headline.main: Chiellini Says Suarez Ban for Biting Him Excessive
headline.print_headline: Chiellini Says Suarez Ban for Biting Him Excessive

docs.snippet: The international players' union has questioned the severity and focus of FIFA's punishment of Luis Suarez for biting an opponent at the World Cup, saying it "infringes his right to work" and doesn't offer him the treatment he needs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The international players' union has questioned the severity and focus of FIFA's punishment of Luis Suarez for biting an opponent at the World Cup, saying it "infringes his right to work" and doesn't offer him the treatment he needs.

headline.main: FIFPro Questions FIFA's Punishment of Luis Suarez
headline.print_headline: FIFPro Questions FIFA's Punishment of Luis Suarez

docs.snippet: Some of Latin America's most prominent leftists are accusing football's world governing body FIFA of banning star striker Luis Suarez as a ploy to sideline his Uruguayan team from a World Cup brimming with Latin flavour and European flops....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some of Latin America's most prominent leftists are accusing football's world governing body FIFA of banning star striker Luis Suarez as a ploy to sideline his Uruguayan team from a World Cup brimming with Latin flavour and European flops.

headline.main: Latin American Leftists See Red Over Suarez Ban
headline.print_headline: Latin American Leftists See Red Over Suarez Ban

docs.snippet: A 90-day provisional ban by FIFA on World Cup-winning player and coach Franz Beckenbauer has been lifted after only 15 days with world football's governing body saying on Friday the German was now welcome at the tournament....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 90-day provisional ban by FIFA on World Cup-winning player and coach Franz Beckenbauer has been lifted after only 15 days with world football's governing body saying on Friday the German was now welcome at the tournament.

headline.main: FIFA Lifts Ban on World Cup Winner Beckenbauer
headline.print_headline: FIFA Lifts Ban on World Cup Winner Beckenbauer

docs.snippet: Uruguay coach Oscar Tabarez accused FIFA of an indiscriminate use of power by imposing an "excessive" punishment on striker Luis Suarez and he said he would resign from positions he holds within world football's governing body....
docs.lead_paragraph: Uruguay coach Oscar Tabarez accused FIFA of an indiscriminate use of power by imposing an "excessive" punishment on striker Luis Suarez and he said he would resign from positions he holds within world football's governing body.

headline.main: Uruguay Coach Hits Out at FIFA Over Suarez Ban
headline.print_headline: Uruguay Coach Hits Out at FIFA Over Suarez Ban

docs.snippet: FIFA defended the harsh punishment it handed down to Uruguay striker Luis Suarez for biting an opponent during the World Cup, despite complaints on Friday from his coach, politicians and even the man he bit that the record penalty was excessive....
docs.lead_paragraph: FIFA defended the harsh punishment it handed down to Uruguay striker Luis Suarez for biting an opponent during the World Cup, despite complaints on Friday from his coach, politicians and even the man he bit that the record penalty was excessive.

headline.main: FIFA Defends Suarez Biting Ban That Many Call Excessive
headline.print_headline: FIFA Defends Suarez Biting Ban That Many Call Excessive

docs.snippet: A U.S. judge on Friday examined potential remedies to resolve the case between athletes and the National Collegiate Athletic Association that seeks to reshape traditional notions of amateur sports in the United States....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. judge on Friday examined potential remedies to resolve the case between athletes and the National Collegiate Athletic Association that seeks to reshape traditional notions of amateur sports in the United States.

headline.main: Trial Ends, Judge to Rule on Lawsuit Against NCAA Over Athlete Pay
headline.print_headline: Trial Ends, Judge to Rule on Lawsuit Against NCAA Over Athlete Pay

docs.snippet: Diego Maradona blasted FIFA's ban on Uruguay striker Luis Suarez as "criminal" and said world soccer's governing body might as well handcuff the striker and lock him up in Guantanamo prison....
docs.lead_paragraph: Diego Maradona blasted FIFA's ban on Uruguay striker Luis Suarez as "criminal" and said world soccer's governing body might as well handcuff the striker and lock him up in Guantanamo prison.

headline.main: FIFA May as Well Throw Suarez Into Guantanamo: Maradona
